text: Burgwedel is a town in Hanover in Lower Saxony, Germany. It is about 15 km northeast of Hanover. About 20,200 people live there. == Districts == Burgwedel has 7 districts: * Engensen * Fuhrberg * Großburgwedel (seat) * Kleinburgwedel * Oldhorst * Thönse * Wettmar == Economy == Rossmann, a drugstore chain, is in Burgwedel. == References ==
title: Burgwedel
